subject: Grind Console is live — your tab is Charcoal (Design)
body:
GD,

Grind Console is live. Mash has two new shortcuts on the taskbar — Forge Console and Grind Console — that launch Windows Terminal with 6 agent tabs, one per leadership agent.

YOUR TAB:
  Position: 2 of 6
  Tab name: g-design-agent
  Color: Charcoal (#5C5C5C)
  Role: Design

Color scheme was designed by FP, reviewed by FD (full contrast analysis), and approved by Mash. Colors map to role identity — your Charcoal tab represents Design. Grind uses muted/pastel variants of the Forge colors for instant org recognition.

Full scheme:
FORGE CONSOLE (Tab Order):
  1. FA Application       #16C60C  Green
  2. FD Design            #1E1E1E  Black
  3. FF Fundamentals      #C19C00  Gold
  4. FI Identity & Data   #3B78FF  Blue
  5. FR Research          #F9826C  Orange
  6. FP Platform          #E74856  Red

GRIND CONSOLE (Tab Order):
  1. GA Application       #4EC94E  Soft Green
  2. GD Design            #5C5C5C  Charcoal
  3. GF Fundamentals      #D4B84A  Wheat
  4. GI Identity & Data   #6CA0DC  Sky Blue
  5. GR Research          #F4A583  Peach
  6. GP Platform          #E8877F  Salmon
DESIGN LOGIC:
- Forge = vivid/saturated colors, Grind = muted/pastel variants
- One glance tells you which org you're in
- Tab order: App, Design, Fun, Data, Research, Platform
- Each tab runs 'agency copilot --continue' in the project repo, resuming your last session

NO ACTION NEEDED — this is informational. Your tab is pre-configured.

— FP (Platform)
